snippet.title: UFC 4 Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-order UFC 4 now and get bonus fighters Tyson Fury and Anthony Joshua: 
http://x.ea.com/ufc4/ytgp-preorder

With more control in striking, Real Player Motion Technology elevating two-player grappling exchanges, the new submission system, and a devastating ground and pound overhaul, players will feel every phase of the fight EA SPORTS UFC 4 gameplay.  

UFC 4 officially launches worldwide August 14th. Subscribe to this channel to keep up to date with all the latest trailer, tutorials, announcements and more: http://x.ea.com/ufc4/subscribe

#UFC4 #Gameplay 

Follow EA Sports UFC
IG: http://instagram.com/easportsufc
Twitter: http://twitter.com/easportsufc
Facebook: http://facebook.com/easportsufc
